sentences.en: Collect geological samples, faunal materials, botanical specimens, and sediments samples.
sentences.cn: 收藏地质样品 、 动物区系的资料 、 植物学的样品和沉积样品.

sentences.en: Faunal assemblage are directly related to the depositional environment.
sentences.cn: 动物群落与沉积环境有直接关系.

sentences.en: Intermittent faunal connections do not necessarily require land bridges to connect isolated areas only to be afterwards destroyed;
sentences.cn: 间歇性的动物物种联系并不一定需要大陆桥来连接之后会被摧毁的隔离区域；

sentences.en: Nor do we have an idea as to the timing of these faunal connections.
sentences.cn: 我们也不知道这些动物物种联系的时间表。
潘的时刻, 牧神的午后.

sentences.en: This paper analyzes their species distribution, population size and faunal and ecological distribution characteristics.
sentences.cn: 对它们的种类分布、种群数量、区系与生态分布特点进行了分析。
